QuestData.Title: Wind Master To'bor
QuestData.Description: You're a tough mother, $n. I think your talents are better suited elsewhere - like the root of the whole damn problem!$B$B<Razgor points to the west.>$B$BA thousand Scourge, at least four full sized floating death machines and who knows what else.$B$BBut you're gonna find out and then you're gonna handle it... That's right, you're gonna beat the hell out of the Scourge army that's currently beating down our door.$B$BGet to the top of Warsong Hold and report to Wind Master To'bor. He'll be expecting you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Wind Master To'bor at Warsong Hold.
QuestData.RewardText: Ay, mon. I been expectin' you.$B$B<To'bor points west.>$B$BTake a peek. Across dat tundra be death, mon... death.
